summary: Microsoft and IBM shares both closed at all-time highs Monday . The two tech titans are coming out of a week where both stocks set multiple records . Still, some Wall Street analysts have suggested both could have room to rise, expecting more AI-driven gains .  Wall Street’s consensus price target according to Visible Alpha is about $531, implying 9% upside from Monday's close . Wedbush analysts said IBM could be “well-positioned to capitalize on the current demand shift for hybrid and AI applications. on the AI front,” in a note to clients .

Bitcoin's long-held belief as a major volatile asset has been challenged amid the Iran-Israel conflict . On June 21, the United States carried out a strike on Iran, where it bombed three of its main nuclear facilities . Bitcoin's 60-day realized volatility had fallen to approximately 27% to 28%, according to Bitwise Europe's André Dragosch .  In February 2022, Bitcoin hit volatility levels of 60% to 65% during the onset of the Russia-Ukraine conflict, showing a stark difference from the current pattern . Analysts suggest that the difference is mainly attributed to long-term holders and institutional investors . Over 30% of Bitcoin's circulating supply is controlled by just 216 centralized entities .  U.S. aren’t safe in heated global tensions anymore, experts say . This story was originally reported by TheStreet on Jun 23, 2025, where it first appeared .

Microsoft and AMD announced a multi-year agreement to co-engineer custom silicon for Microsoft’s next-generation Xbox consoles . The partnership aims to enhance visual quality, immersive gameplay, and AI-powered experiences across a flexible hardware lineup . Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is one of thebest QQQ stocks to buy according to hedge funds .  Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) develops and supports software, services, devices, and solutions worldwide . Advanced Micro Devices Inc. previously supplied chips for earlier Xbox and PlayStation models . We believe certain AI stocks offer greater upside potential and carry less downside risk .

Microsoft is preparing to lay off thousands of employees, primarily in sales, Bloomberg News reports . The cuts are expected to be announced early next month, after the end of Microsoft's fiscal year . The move follows a previous round of cuts in May that impacted about 6,000 workers .  The company's AI rollout would likely reduce its corporate headcount over time . This article first appeared on GuruFocus.com.com/GuruFocus .

Leaked code suggests xAI is developing an advanced file editor for Grok with spreadsheet support . xAI hasn't explicitly detailed its strategy for pursuing interactive, multimodal AI workspaces . In April 2025, xAI launchedGrok Studio, a split-screen workspace that lets users collaborate with Grok on generating documents, code, reports, and browser games .  xAI is reportedly working on Gemini Workspace, which works within Google's Docs, Sheets, and Gmail . It's not clear what types of files xAI's editor might support aside from spreadsheets . The advanced editor would be a step toward Elon Musk’s ambitions to turn X into an “everything app”

The "Magnificent Seven" stocks have generated impressive returns for long-term investors . But after years of big gains, most of the Magnificent Seven stocks are losing their luster . Apple is still overwhelmingly dependent on the iPhone, Amazon faces stiff competition from cheaper cross-border competitors .  Meta and Nvidia face fewer near-term headwinds than the other five stocks . Meta generates nearly all of its revenue from ads, and growth could slow down as the global economy cools off . Nvidia isn't immune to economic downturns and recessions, but expansion of its AI chipmaking business could offset that pressure .  Nvidia once generated most of its revenue from its gaming GPUs . But in its latest quarter, 89% came from its data center GPUs . Data center GPUs are better suited for processing complex AI tasks than stand-alone CPUs .  Analysts expect Nvidia's revenue and earnings per share to grow at compound annual growth rates of 30% and 28% from fiscal 2025 to fiscal 2028 . Nvidia has comfortably beat Wall Street's top- and bottom-line expectations for nine consecutive quarters . Its stock still looks reasonably valued relative to those estimates at 36 times forward earnings .  Nvidia locks in customers with its proprietary Compute Unified Device Architecture (CUDA) programming platform . Developers write their AI applications on CUDA, they become optimized for Nvidia's GPUs and can only be executed on its chips . That stickiness widens its moat againstAMDand other challengers .  The Motley Fool’s total average return is994% — a market-crushing outperformance compared to172% for the S&P 500 . These services cover key areas like threat detection, identity and access management, application security, network protection, data encryption and compliance monitoring .  AWS reported $29.3 billion in revenues for the first quarter of 2025, up 17% year over year . AWS is facing tough competition fromMicrosoftMSFT andOracleORCL as cloud security becomes a top priority .  AMZN shares have lost 4.4% in the year-to-date period, underperforming the Zacks Retail-Wholesale sector’s growth of 2.1% and 0.8% . Microsoft recently announced a strategic collaboration with the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency to standardize threat actor naming .  The Zacks Consensus Estimate for second-quarter 2025 earnings is pegged at $1.31 per share, indicating 6.5% year-over-year growth . IBM watsonx.governance is a well-known tool that directs, manages and monitors an organization’s AI to support responsible, transparent AI use cases .  The Guardium AI security tool detects new AI use cases in cloud environments, code repositories and embedded systems . IBM is also collaborating with SAP to tap generative-AI technology within the retail industry . Amazon Bedrock offers comprehensive data protection and privacy .  IBM has surged 60.6% over the past year compared with the industry’s growth of 5.8% . Nebius Group N.V. is expanding aggressively in North America and Europe . Backed by a $700 million funding round involving high-profile investors like NVIDIA and Accel in December 2024 .  In June 2025, NBIS announced private placement of $1 billion in convertible notes to capitalize on the AI-infrastructure boom and drive-up revenue opportunities in 2026 . The company holds a minority stake of approximately 28% in ClickHouse . Recent media reports suggest that a fundraising round is currently in progress, potentially valuing ClickHouse at around $6 billion .  Nebius competes with technology giants likeCoreWeave, Inc.CRWV andMicrosoft Corporation . CoreWeave is an AI-focused hyperscaler company . Its cloud platform has been designed to scale, support and accelerate GenAI .  Microsoft's increased availability in more than 60 announced regions globally is expected to have strengthened Microsoft's competitive position in the cloud computing market . For fourth-quarter fiscal 2025, management guided total revenues of $73.15–74.25 billion, with Azure/cloud growth projected at 34–35% constant currency . Shares of Nebius surged 153.3% in the past year compared with the Internet Software and Services industry’s growth of 39.3%.  Nebius Group N.V. currently carries a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold) Internet Software Services industry’s 4.07X. NBIS is the latest in a growing list of strong-buyers in the market .

Microsoft currently has an average brokerage recommendation (ABR) of 1.28, on a scale of 1 to 5 (Strong Buy to Strong Sell), calculated based on the actual recommendations (Buy, Hold, Sell, etc.) made by 47 brokerage firms . Of the 47 recommendations that derive the current ABR, 38 are Strong Buy and five are Buy .  The vested interest of brokerage firms in a stock they cover often results in a strong positive bias of their analysts in rating it . The best use of this information could be validating your own research or an indicator that has proven to be highly successful in predicting a stock's price movement .  Both Zacks Rank and ABR are displayed in a range of 1--5, they are different measures altogether . The ABR is calculated solely based on brokerage recommendations . The ZACK Rank is a quantitative model allowing investors to harness the power of earnings estimate revisions .  Near-term stock price movements are strongly correlated with trends in earnings estimate revisions, according to empirical research . The different Zacks Rank grades are applied proportionately to all stocks for which analysts provide current-year earnings estimates . The Zacks Consensus Estimate for the current year has remained unchanged over the past month at $13.36 .  Microsoft Corporation (MSFT) has a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold) for Microsoft . The company's earnings prospects, as indicated by an unchanged consensus estimate, could be a legitimate reason for the stock to perform in line with the broader market in the near term .

C3.ai is doubling down on a go-to-market strategy centered around its rapidly expanding partner ecosystem . In fiscal 2025, it signed 193 deals through the partner ecosystem, reflecting a rise of 68% from the prior year .  C3.ai is now jointly targeting over 600 accounts with Microsoft alone . Palantir Technologies Inc. is pursuing similar scaling with AWS, Google Cloud and newly formed alliances like PwC and McKinsey QuantumBlack .  Snowflake Inc. is building a hybrid model that blends direct go-to-market with strong platform partnerships . Snowflake's model emphasizes data ecosystem interoperability, supporting structured and unstructured data across platforms .  Shares of C3.ai, have gained 0.5% in the past three months compared with the industry’s growth of 0.3% . AI trades at a forward price-to-sales ratio of 6.50X, significantly below the industry's average of 18.47X . AI stock currently carries a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy)  Palantir Technologies Inc. Inc. (SNOW) Inc. has been a long-awaited up-and-down market leader . The company is now a top-ranked stock .

Microsoft(MSFT) has been one of the most searched-for stocks on Zacks.com lately . Over the past month, shares of this software maker have returned +6.1%, compared to the Zacks S&P 500 composite's +0.5% change . The key question is: What could be the stock's future direction?  For the current quarter, Microsoft is expected to post earnings of $3.35 per share, indicating a change of +13.6% from the year-ago quarter . The Zacks Consensus Estimate remained unchanged over the last 30 days .  Over the past month, the estimate has changed +0.1% from what Microsoft is expected to report a year ago . Microsoft has a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold) for Microsoft . The company's earnings growth is arguably the best indicator of its financial health .  Microsoft reported revenues of $70.07 billion in the last reported quarter, representing a year-over-year change of +13.3% . The company beat consensus estimates in each of the trailing four quarters . Microsoft topped consensus revenue estimates each time over this period .  The Zacks Value Style Score organizes stocks into five groups ranging from A to F . Microsoft is graded D on this front, indicating that it is trading at a premium to its peers .  Microsoft's Zacks Rank #3 does suggest that it may perform in line with the broader market in the near term . The company's Z.S. Rank suggests that Microsoft may perform well in the future . Microsoft Corporation is one of the top-ranked companies in the world .

Solace Platform cited for full breadth of functionality, as well asoverall product and customer experience . An "Exemplary" rating is the highest classification given to those vendors who performed beyond the median . Solace received highest marks for its complete scope of messaging and event processing functionality .  ISG's Messaging and Event Processing Buyers Guide assessed 15 software providers . Solace's long-term focus on event-driven technology is reflected by its classification as Exemplary, as well as a Leader in both Product Experience and Customer Experience .  ISG Research also ranked Solace as an "Exemplary Provider" in two other related Buyers Guides . Solace's event-driven integration platform has proven to be the standard for seamlessly connecting systems through the instantaneous sharing of real-time events .  Solace helps enterprises adopt AI by enabling real-time, event-driven data movement across their entire business . Built on a modernevent-driven architecture, Solace Platform connects systems, applications, and AI agents with the data they need — securely, seamlessly, and at scale .  Solace Corp. 7531 is Solace Corporation . Solace is a company that focuses on small manufacturing and small-scale manufacturing facilities . The company is based in New York City, New Jersey .
